title: Malaysia : number of Facebook users 2017 to 2023
summary: In general Number of users in millions has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of users in millions is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Number of users in millions, of value 22.7 was reached at Year 2019
Minimum Number of users in millions about 22.0 was reached at Year 2017
min_summary: Overall Number of users in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of users in millions is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2019.
